mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS couponCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN #{today} <= couponExpireDate AND couponExpireDate <= #{futureDate} THEN 1 END) AS expireCount FROM `memberCouponHistory` WHERE `email` = #{email}

SELECT a.`historySeq` AS historySeq, a.`email` AS email, a.`couponId` AS couponId, a.`couponExpireDate` AS couponExpireDate, a.`useYn` AS useYn, a.`createdAt` AS createdAt, b.`couponName` AS couponName, b.`couponApply` AS couponApply, b.`discountMoney` AS discountMoney, b.`discountPercent` AS discountPercent, b.`discountType` AS discountType, b.`discountLimit` AS discountLimit, b.`couponReason` AS couponReason, b.`couponCustomer` AS couponCustomer FROM `memberCouponHistory` AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN `coupon` AS b ON a.`couponId` = b.`couponId` WHERE a.`email` = #{email} LIMIT #{pg}, 10
